name: Phone Crew Rumble
description:
A short fight that's meant to take place after chapter 2 of Lisa the Pointless: Phone Crew.

Includes:
-1 fight, in 2 difficulties (or 4 if you know how to unlock it)
-Dodging mechanics
-Bad dialogue

New music track: Impish Dude - Nɨɦɨʟ

I would post the Phone Crew download link, but Squadix took it off the internet so I don't feel like it's right. You can still download and play it, it's not hard to find, but him taking it off sends a message, so I suggest you don't, even if it's a good game imo.

Pointless: https://gamejolt.com/games/lisa-the-pointless/221705
